account.note: Born and raised in Graz, Austria. Lived in southwestern Germany (aka “The Länd”) for most of my adult life. Reside and work in Tokyo since 2018. Data Architect in my day job. Photographer (analog and iPhone), coffee/café lover, photo book collector and 日本語の学生 in my spare time. Other interests and hobbies include traveling, classic movies, board games, fountain pens and notebooks. I also read a lot - mostly biographies, technical books, comics, books by Finnish authors, and philosophy.

descendants.content:
@norbertwoehnl
Watching others walking or driving in a Thunderstorm is so soothing for me, makes me sleepy Everytime. 😅

I adore these Videos from Japan, where someone drives on the highway at night through heavy rain, I use them to listen to for falling asleep. 😃

I'm a sucker for this type of content. 😁

#Japan #Rain #Video #Weather

account.note:
Blogger, Teacher, Father, Immigrant.

- Gallivants on the Seto Inland Sea art islands.
- French, but teaches English at a Japanese university.
- Raises two wonderful kids that drive him nuts.
- Friend of crows
- Doesn't read nearly enough these days.
- Writes things. Tries to be better at it, both quantitatively and qualitatively.
- Hopes the world doesn't end soon.
- Mostly talks about #Japan, #Education, #Crows and #Climate here (the shitposts are on my other account)

descendants.content: @norbertwoehnl Yesterday I had to help my father-in-law who had to clear a blocked drain on the roof. The water was already ankle-deep on the roof veranda. I held the umbrella for him, while I was soaked in seconds of course. That felt nice after the heat though.
